availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tavernkeeper. Native of Hanover. Married to Mary Drichans Droppelman in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on May 4, 1854. Father of Mary Droppelman, Bernard Droppelman, Louisa Droppelman, Elizabeth Droppelman, and Theodore Droppelman. Tavernkeeper in partnership with Bernard Reiling in Reiling & Company in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Tavernkeeper in Louisville in 1861. Tavernkeeper in Louisville in 1863. Tavernkeeper in Louisville in 1865.
